definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: After examination and approval by the Trademark Office, a corresponding certificate shall be issued to the registrant and the change shall be published.
sentences.chinese: 经商标局核准后，发给注册人相应证明，并予以公告。

sentences.english: Don't remove to other Forums, Blogs and Baidu. Thanks.
sentences.chinese: 站内公告，请不要转出云音，谢谢。

sentences.english: The item 4 includes the explanation that three public announcements have been made within liquidation period;
sentences.chinese: 第4项应包括清算期内已公告三次的说明。

sentences.english: The customs may publish the failure of taxpayers to pay duty.
sentences.chinese: 海关可以对纳税义务人欠缴税款的情况予以公告。

sentences.english: Why weren't they all buying gold as soon as the announcement was made?
sentences.chinese: 为毛他们不在公告发出之后第一时间买黄金？

sentences.english: After a five-year hiatus, the Billboard Music Awards officially returned in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 经过5年的停办，美国公告牌音乐奖重回荧屏。

sentences.english: Any renewal of registration shall be published after it has been approved.
sentences.chinese: 续展注册经核准后，予以公告。

sentences.english: After the assignment of a registered trademark has been approved, it shall be publicly announced.
sentences.chinese: 转让注册商标经核准后，予以公告。

sentences.english: Please link to the following web addresses for furthur details.
sentences.chinese: 详情请登入以下相关连结网址查询中英文公告。

sentences.english: The results of annual inspections shall be made public for supervision.
sentences.chinese: 要将年检的结果公告社会，以便于监督。

sentences.english: The school shall erect regulations to implement gender equity education, and promulgate them.
sentences.chinese: 学校应订定性别平等教育实施规定，并公告周知。

sentences.english: Participate in online games, chats, bulletin boards, and forums.
sentences.chinese: 进入在线游戏，聊天，公告板，论坛。

sentences.english: Myanmar issued on Tuesday night a curfew order in the country's biggest city of Yangon.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸昨晚在该国最年夜都会仰光公告宵禁令。

sentences.english: GAF Forum Bulletin issued and major issues relevant information.
sentences.chinese: GAF论坛公告发表及重大事情相关信息。

sentences.english: These will be used to classify our announcements.
sentences.chinese: 这些词汇将用来对公告进行分类。

sentences.english: The public announcement and notice shall stipulate the date of the first convening of the creditors' meeting.
sentences.chinese: 公告和通知中应当规定第一次债权人会议召开的日期。

definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate
to reveal/to publish/to make public/to announce
to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to issue (a memorandum etc) to lower levels/to distribute (e.g. disaster relief to victims)
